Class StateStoreUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mesos.state.StateStoreUtils

  • public class StateStoreUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for implementations and users of StateStore.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static byte[] fetchPropertyOrEmptyArray(StateStore stateStore, java.lang.String key)
      Returns the requested property, or an empty array if the property is not present.
      static void validateKey(java.lang.String key)
      Shared implementation for validating property key limits, for use by all StateStore implementations.

      Shared implementation for validating property value limits, for use by all StateStore implementations.
